item.title: By: Mark Leusink
item.dc:creator: Mark Leusink
item.content:encoded:
I’m using a similar setup, but wanted to add some stuff I personally find very useful:

  • nodemon (nodemon.io): start your node server with ‘nodemon’ instead of ‘node’ and it will automatically restart whenever a file changes.

  • Oh My Zsh: a replacement for the standard OS X Terminal, making it easier to work with (that should get your attention ðŸ™‚ I like the color coding and that it only shows the current folder (not a full hierarchy).

  • Useful Sublime Text plugins (installed via Package Manager – the Sublime Text package manager):
    – Sublime Linter with the JSHint plugin for Javascript validation
    – Bracket Highlighter (highlights brackets)
    – Side Bar Enhancements: add right click options to files (for instance "run in browser")
